SELECT * , ( 6371 * acos (cos( RADIANS(#{userLat})) * cos(radians(lat)) * cos(radians(lon) - RADIANS(#{userLon})) + sin (radians(#{userLat})) * sin( radians(lat)) ) ) AS distanceKm FROM STORE WHERE 1=1
and open_close = 'open'
and name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
HAVING distanceKm < #{limitDistanceKm}
ORDER BY
RAND() distanceKm DELIVERY_TIP ORDER_COUNT
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
